Scan IP Enter an IP address or FQDN to scan, i.e. scanme.nmap.org No open port found ! No associated action ! Connect Scan started ... Scan finished ! Scan canceled ! Open (%s) Closed (%s) Host unreachable ! Port %s/tcp
Response time: MAC Address: NIC vendor: Open ports: Closed ports: Unknown
File saved ! Choose file destination Save File already exists Do you want to overwrite ?
Hosts discovery The method that is being used, does not need to have root privileges. In future release there will be more advanced techniques, once the non-root ones are polished.\n\nHere is how it works: \n1. Calculate the subnetwork range\n2. Iterate throught IP and query them\n3. First it sends an ICMP ping or Echo on tcp/7 (with InetAddress.isReachable())\n4. If it does not work, it tries to connect() on well known open tcp ports such as: 135, 139, 22, 111, 80\n5. If none of the above is successful, the host is not discovered Port scan Port scan is event driven, using Java\'s Selector and SocketChannel.\nThere is a fake timeout by registrering the time in ms at socket\'s creation and checking regularly this value.\nThe port scan method, as discovery, uses full tcp connection check. (will be more granular in the future with root features.)\n\nA maximum of 127 Sockets are opened at a time, so this is not always accurate, but quite fast. Again, a new feature is coming that will adapt times between requests according to host response time (kind of software network congestion control)\n\nA port is considered open when tcp connect() is fully successful, closed when no service is listening on the other end, or filtered when the timeout is reached. Links - TCP connect scan: http://nmap.org/book/man-port-scanning-techniques.html#id421401\n\n- Host discovery: http://nmap.org/book/man-host-discovery.html
Help
Credits Discovery Port Scan General
Donate: If you like this app, you can buy me a beer. Resolve Hostname Use system DNS to resolve ip addresses Vibrate Vibrate when Scan is completed Rate control Enable automatic rate detection Custom rate Rate of discovery in millisecondes First Port First TCP Port to scan. 1-65535 Last Port Last TCP Port to scan. 1-65535 Services banners Read banner from a connected socket (ex.: SSH-2.0-OpenSSH_5.1p1) Custom timeout Manually set connect timeout Connect timeout Timeout of a port connection in millisecondes Allow mobile discovery Scan over edge/3g/... usually leading to strange results, if any SSH User Username for the SSH connection Threads pool Maximum number of threads to use in host discovery (1-256) Update NIC Database Pull and update MAC addresses database Do you want to download %1$s ? (~%2$sk) Database updated ! %s new entries ... Version Website Contact Network interface Choose which interface to use Discover Method Change to different method of host discovery Choose a method IP start First IP address to scan IP end Last IP address to scan Custom IP range Manually set start/end IPs Custom CIDR Manually set CIDR (defines subnet) Change CIDR

// about device update 本地升级
设备&更新 网络升级 检查新版本 服务器IP设置 下载&更新 当前有可用版本更新
版本更新信息 网络连接出错,请检查后重试 服务器异常,请稍后重试 正在获取最新版本.. 当前已是最新版本 固件下载完成，点击进行设备升级 当前有可用版本更新,请点击下载更新 提示 确定 取消 正在下载中 升级固件下载中 升级固件排入队列,等待开启下载.. 后台下载 取消下载 固件数据校验处理中.. 正在连接服务器.. 固件包下载解压完成，但设备升级需要手机接入设备SOFTAP，是否立刻前往配置？ 升级固件下载完成,是否进行设备升级？ 设备升级中.. 正在进行升级前准备.. 请等待设备重启完成.. 固件数据读取错误,请重新下载. 设备更新成功. 设备更新失败,请检查设备状态 检测到设备版本已经是最新.. 警告 网络设置提示 网络连接出错，是否前往配置? 前往配置 取消 // 服务器IP设置 服务器IP设置 服务器IP设置成功，新服务器IP为：
